metadata.title: CVE-2018-20760 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In GPAC 0.7.1 and earlier, gf_text_get_utf8_line inmedia_tools/text_import.c in libgpac_static.a allows an out-of-bounds writebecause a certain -1 return value is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20760` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-1ubuntu0.1
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-1ubuntu0.1
libgpac4 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-1ubuntu0.1').
